replies.message:
Bring em back to the UK by signing his petition for him to do another tour here!!!!

Sign and share!!!!

https://www.change.org/p/marshall-mathers-eminem-me-and-many-others-would-love-it-if-you-could-do-one-last-tour-in-the-uk-as-thousands-of-us-missed-your-two-night-stint-at-wembley-in-2014-we-just-want-one-last-chance-to-see-a-rap-legend-live-before-you-leave-the-game-for-goo?recruiter=350307000&utm_source=share_petition&utm_medium=copylink&rp_sharecordion_checklist=control
If this gets enough support I will extend it to dre as well!!!
